Root.description: A template for creating multilingual websites with Next.js and next-intl.

metadata.title: Home Page
metadata.description: This is the home page of the multilingual Next.js template.

HomePage.heroDescription: This is a starting point for your new multilingual website. You can edit this text in the `messages/en.json` file.

metadata.title: About Us
metadata.description: Information about the project or company.

AboutPage.mainSubtitle: This page describes your project, team, and technology.
AboutPage.teamText: Replace this with information about your team.
AboutPage.nmrText: Description for the first placeholder section. You can customize this content.
AboutPage.lcmsText: Description for the second placeholder section.
AboutPage.ftirText: Description for the third placeholder section.
AboutPage.focusText: Description for the fourth placeholder section.
AboutPage.serviceText: A brief, compelling summary of the primary service or value proposition.

metadata.title: FAQ
metadata.description: Find answers to frequently asked questions.

q1.question: What is this template for?
q1.answer: This is a template for creating multilingual websites with Next.js and next-intl.

q2.question: How do I add a new language?
q2.answer: You can add a new language by creating a new JSON file in the `messages` directory and updating the `src/i18n/routing.ts` file.

q3.question: Where can I find more information?
q3.answer: You can find more information in the documentation for Next.js and next-intl.
